name: ITLibMediaItem
desc: This class describes a media item (a track) in the iTunes library, such as a song, a video, or a podcast.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The title of the media item.

items.name: var sortTitle: String?
items.desc: The title of the media item to use when sorting.

items.name: var artist: ITLibArtist?
items.desc: Information about the artist that iTunes associates with the media item.

items.name: var composer: String
items.desc: The name of the composer that iTunes associates with the media item.

items.name: var sortComposer: String?
items.desc: The name to use when sorting by composer.

items.name: var rating: Int
items.desc: The rating of the media item.

items.name: var isRatingComputed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether iTunes computes the media item’s rating from its album rating.

items.name: var startTime: Int
items.desc: If nonzero, the actual time playback of the media item starts instead of 0:00 (in milliseconds).

items.name: var stopTime: Int
items.desc: If nonzero, the actual time playback of the media item stops versus the total time (in milliseconds).

items.name: var album: ITLibAlbum
items.desc: The album of the media item.

items.name: var genre: String
items.desc: The genre of the media item, if any.

items.name: var kind: String?
items.desc: The kind of media item file, such as an MPEG audio file.

items.name: var mediaKind: ITLibMediaItemMediaKind
items.desc: The kind of media item.

items.name: var totalTime: Int
items.desc: The length of the media item in milliseconds.

items.name: var trackNumber: Int
items.desc: The position of the media item within its album.

items.name: var category: String?
items.desc: The podcast category of the media item, if the media item is a podcast.

items.name: var description: String?
items.desc: The description of the media item, if it’s a podcast.

items.name: var contentRating: String?
items.desc: The content rating of the media item.

items.name: var lyricsContentRating: ITLibMediaItemLyricsContentRating
items.desc: The content rating of the media item’s lyrics.

items.name: var addedDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time that the user added the media item to the iTunes library.

items.name: var modifiedDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time that iTunes last modified the media item.

items.name: var bitrate: Int
items.desc: The bitrate of the media item in kbit/s.

items.name: var sampleRate: Int
items.desc: The sample rate of the media item in samples-per-second.

items.name: var beatsPerMinute: Int
items.desc: The beats-per-minute (BPM) of the media item.

items.name: var playCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the user has played the media item.

items.name: var lastPlayedDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time the user last played the media item, or nil if the user hasn’t played it.

items.name: var location: URL?
items.desc: The location of the media item on disk.

items.name: var locationType: ITLibMediaItemLocationType
items.desc: The type of the media item with respect to its location.

items.name: var hasArtworkAvailable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the media item has artwork.

items.name: var artwork: ITLibArtwork?
items.desc: The artwork of the media item.

items.name: var comments: String?
items.desc: Any comments that iTunes associates with the media item.

items.name: var isPurchased: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user purchased the media item from the iTunes Store.

items.name: var isDRMProtected: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the media item has digital rights management (DRM) protection.

items.name: var isVideo: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this media item is a video, such as a TV show, video podcast, or movie.

items.name: var videoInfo: ITLibMediaItemVideoInfo?
items.desc: Video information (such as width and height) about the media item, if it’s a video.

items.name: var releaseDate: Date?
items.desc: The release date of the media item.

items.name: var year: Int
items.desc: The release year of the media item.

items.name: var skipCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times that the user skipped the media item.

items.name: var skipDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time that the user last skipped the media item.

items.name: var voiceOverLanguage: String?
items.desc: The voice-over language of the media item.

items.name: var volumeAdjustment: Int
items.desc: The volume adjustment for the media item, if any.

items.name: var volumeNormalizationEnergy: Int
items.desc: The volume normalization energy that iTunes applies to the media item to bring the average or peak amplitude to a target level.

items.name: var isUserDisabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user disabled the media item.

items.name: var grouping: String?
items.desc: The grouping of the media item that the user specifies or that iTunes specifies in the file’s metadata.

items.name: var fileSize: UInt64
items.desc: The size in bytes of this media item on disk.

items.name: var isCloud: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this media item is an iTunes Match or an iTunes in the Cloud item.

items.name: var playStatus: ITLibMediaItemPlayStatus
items.desc: The play status for the media.

items.name: enum ITLibMediaItemMediaKind
items.desc: These constants specify the possible media kinds of a media item.

items.name: enum ITLibMediaItemLocationType
items.desc: These constants specify the location type of a media item.

items.name: enum ITLibMediaItemLyricsContentRating
items.desc: These constants specify the possible ratings of media item lyrics.

items.name: enum ITLibMediaItemPlayStatus
items.desc: These constants specify the play status of the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaEntityPropertyPersistentID: String
items.desc: The unique identifier of the media entity.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyAddedDate: String
items.desc: The date and time the user added the media item to the iTunes library.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyAlbumArtist: String
items.desc: The name of the artist that iTunes associates with the media item’s album.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyAlbumDiscCount: String
items.desc: The number of discs in the media item’s album.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyAlbumDiscNumber: String
items.desc: The disc number in the media item’s album.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyAlbumIsCompilation: String
items.desc: This property indicates whether the album of the media item is a compilation.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyAlbumIsGapless: String
items.desc: This property indicates whether the media item’s album is gapless.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyAlbumRating: String
items.desc: The rating of the media item’s album.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyAlbumRatingComputed: String
items.desc: This property indicates whether iTunes computes the rating of the media item’s album from the ratings of individual tracks in the album.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyAlbumTitle: String
items.desc: The title of the media item’s album.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyAlbumTrackCount: String
items.desc: The track count of the media item’s album.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyArtistName: String
items.desc: The name of the artist that iTunes associates with the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyArtwork: String
items.desc: The artwork for the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyBeatsPerMinute: String
items.desc: The beats-per-minute (BPM) of the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyBitRate: String
items.desc: The bitrate of the media item in kbit/s.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyCategory: String
items.desc: The podcast category of the media item, if the media item is a podcast.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyComments: String
items.desc: Any comments that iTunes associates with the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyComposer: String
items.desc: The name of the composer that iTunes associates with the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyContentRating: String
items.desc: The extended content rating of the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyDescription: String
items.desc: A podcast description of the media item, if the media item is a podcast.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyFileSize: String
items.desc: The size in bytes of the media item on disk.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyGenre: String
items.desc: The genre that iTunes associates with the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyGrouping: String
items.desc: The grouping of the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyHasArtwork: String
items.desc: This property indicates whether the media item has artwork.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyIsDRMProtected: String
items.desc: This property indicates whether the media item has digital rights management (DRM) protection.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyIsPurchased: String
items.desc: This property indicates whether the media item is a purchased media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyIsUserDisabled: String
items.desc: This property indicates whether the user disabled the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyIsVideo: String
items.desc: This property indicates whether the media item is a video media item, such as a video podcast or movie.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyKind: String
items.desc: The kind of media item file, such as an MPEG audio file.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyLastPlayDate: String
items.desc: The date and time the user last played the media item in iTunes, or nil if the user hasn’t played the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyLocation: String
items.desc: The location of the media item on disk.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyLocationType: String
items.desc: The type of the media item with respect to its location.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyLyricsContentRating: String
items.desc: The content rating of the media item’s lyrics.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyMediaKind: String
items.desc: The media kind of the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyModifiedDate: String
items.desc: The date and time that iTunes last modified the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyPlayCount: String
items.desc: The number of times the user has played the media item in iTunes.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyPlayStatus: String
items.desc: The play status of the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyRating: String
items.desc: The rating of the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyRatingComputed: String
items.desc: This property indicates whether iTunes computes the media item’s rating.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyReleaseDate: String
items.desc: The release date of the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertySampleRate: String
items.desc: The sample rate of the media item in samples-per-second.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertySize: String
items.desc: The size in bytes of the media item on disk.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertySkipDate: String
items.desc: The date and time that the user last skipped the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertySortAlbumArtist: String
items.desc: The name of the artist that iTunes associates with the media item’s album, for use when sorting.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertySortAlbumTitle: String
items.desc: The title of the media item’s album, for use when sorting.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertySortArtistName: String
items.desc: The name of the media item’s artist, for use when sorting.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertySortComposer: String
items.desc: The name of the composer that iTunes associates with the media item, for use when sorting.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertySortTitle: String
items.desc: The title of the media item to use when sorting.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyStartTime: String
items.desc: If nonzero, the actual time that playback for the media item starts instead of 0:00 (in milliseconds).

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyStopTime: String
items.desc: If nonzero, the actual time that playback for the media item stops versus the total time (in milliseconds).

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyTitle: String
items.desc: The title of the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyTotalTime: String
items.desc: The length of the media item in milliseconds.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyTrackNumber: String
items.desc: The numerical position of the media item within its album.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyUserSkipCount: String
items.desc: The number of times that the user skipped the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyVideoEpisode: String
items.desc: The name of the episode, if the media item is an episode of a TV series.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyVideoEpisodeOrder: String
items.desc: The order of the episode, if the media item is an episode of a TV series.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyVideoHeight: String
items.desc: The height in pixels, if the media item is a video.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyVideoIsHD: String
items.desc: This property indicates whether a video media item is high-definition.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyVideoSeason: String
items.desc: The corresponding TV season, if the media item is an episode of a TV series.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyVideoSeries: String
items.desc: The name of the corresponding TV series, if the media item is an episode in a TV series.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyVideoSortSeries: String
items.desc: The sorting name of the corresponding TV series, if the media item is an episode in a TV series.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyVideoWidth: String
items.desc: The width in pixels, if the media item is a video.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyVoiceOverLanguage: String
items.desc: The voice-over language of the media item.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyVolumeAdjustment: String
items.desc: The volume adjustment for the media item, if any.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyVolumeNormalizationEnergy: String
items.desc: The volume normalization energy that iTunes applies to the media item to bring the average or peak amplitude to a target level.

items.name: let ITLibMediaItemPropertyYear: String
items.desc: The release year of the media item.
